AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: witness and observer of the truck's behavior, veteran narcotics investigator with 17 years of experience, teaching Heather Vargas drug interdiction techniques, testified to observations about the truck and trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Heather Vargas: involved in contacting a patrol deputy, relative newcomer to the narcotics division, learning from Gary Haston
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: patrol deputy involved in the traffic stop
